channel.title: Hackathon on Boettiger Group
channel.description: Recent content in Hackathon on Boettiger Group

item.description: Breakfast discussion of what makes an API good or a total pain discussion of extending data.set class with metadata Morning Session Chatting with Hadley: Best practices for R client packages to REST APIs (When) Do we return response call metadata? Very modular function construction Error handling, assertthat checks Explicit parsing, as seperate function. e.g. Better alternatives in place of require when loading SUGGESTS lists, which still pollutes the namespace; see examples in httr.
